title: maNNinda kAya
sahitya:
maNNinda kAya maNNinda


anupallavi

  maNNinda sakala darushanagaLella maNNinda sakala vastugaLella 
maNNu biTTavarige AdhAravilla aNNagaLirellaru kELirayya


caraNam 1  :  anna udaka UtavIyOdu maNNu baNNa bhangAra bokkasavella maNNu 
unnatavAda parvatavella maNNu kaNNu mUruLLavana kailAsa maNNu
    caraNam 2    dEvara guDi maTha maneyella maNNu AvAga aDuva maDageyu tA maNNu 
kOvidarasara kOTegaLella maNNu pAvana gangeya taDiyella maNNu
    caraNam 3    bhakta bharaNa dhAnya beLavude maNNu sattaravanu huLi suDuvude maNNu 
uttamavAda vaikuNThave maNNu purandara viTTalanna puravella maNNu
